triviaQuestions.question: What kind of piano plays songs all by itself off of a big roll of paper?
The word "piano" comes from what language?
triviaQuestions.followupFact: The word piano comes from the Italian word "pianoforte" which means "soft" and "loud."

triviaQuestions.question: What piano part has storage for sheet music?
What is the biggest kind of piano called?
There are three main kinds of piano:  Grand, Electric, and what?
The "buttons" you press on a piano to make music are called what?
The keys of a piano are usually what two colors?
triviaQuestions.hint: This might be a zebra's favorite instrument.

triviaQuestions.question: What is the name of the part of the piano where your feet are placed?
triviaQuestions.hint: You also use these when riding your bike!
